content: this pattern was inspired by the almost lost washcloth pattern already available on ravelry it was a bit too big for my hands so i modified it to make it smaller my dad always was always encouraging me to use any of my talents whether they were considered valuable by society or not for his birthday this year i m publishing my first ever pattern in his memory materials * about 24 inches of worsted weight waste yarn * worsted weight cotton yarn i used knitpicks dishie in my samples * two size 7 double point needles * crochet hook sized appropriately for worsted weight yarn * needle for grafting
